title: geth 1.4.17 crash after block 2425548 (segfault)
body:
#### System information

Geth version: 1.4.17
OS & Version: OSX El Capitan 10.11.6
Commit hash : geth-darwin-amd64-1.4.17-5a6008e0
#### Expected behaviour

Continued sync.
#### Actual behaviour

SIGSEGV after block 2425548.

Upon restart, geth syncs very slowly (< 3 block/min)
#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

Normal sync, no other interaction.
#### Backtrace

full backtrace: https://gist.github.com/celeduc/de802ecdece18612abbe32094fde7fc2

Top:

```

unexpected fault address 0x204979bc00
fatal error: fault
[signal SIGSEGV: segmentation violation code=0x1 addr=0x204979bc00 pc=0x406fafb]
```

This was a side effect of the attacks. Please update to Geth 1.4.18, which should fix the issue.
